hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOVI.EOVI_ID, EOVI.CREATOR, EOVI.CREATE_TIME, EOVI.MODIFIER, EOVI.MODIFY_TIME, EOVI.REC_VER, EOVI.REC_STATUS, EOVI.ORG_ID, EOVI.EOVI_OWNER_CODE, EOVI.EOVI_OWNER_NAME, EOVI.EOVI_SKU_CODE, EOVI.EOVI_SKU_NAME, EOVI.EOVI_QTY, EOVI.EOVI_ONWAY_QTY, EOVI.EOVI_STAGE_QTY, EOVI.EOVI_PA_QTY, EOVI.EOVI_ALLOCATED_QTY, EOVI.EOVI_ONHOLD_QTY, EOVI.EOVI_QC_QTY, EOVI.EOVI_WH_CODE, EOVI.EOVI_LOT_NUM, EOVI.EOVI_UNIT, EOVI.EOVI_PREALLOCATED_QTY, EOVI.EOVI_PRODUCTION_DATE, EOVI.EOVI_LOTATT01, EOVI.EOVI_LOTATT02, EOVI.EOVI_LOTATT03, EOVI.EOVI_LOTATT04, EOVI.EOVI_LOTATT05, EOVI.EOVI_LOTATT06, EOVI.EOVI_LOTATT07, EOVI.EOVI_LOTATT08, EOVI.EOVI_LOTATT09, EOVI.EOVI_LOTATT10, EOVI.EOVI_LOTATT11, EOVI.EOVI_LOTATT12 from EO_VIRTUAL_INV_ITEM EOVI where 1=1 <<and EOVI.REC_STATUS LIKE :recStatus>> <<and EOVI.ORG_ID LIKE :orgId>> <<and EOVI.EOVI_SKU_CODE in(:skuCodes)>> <<and EOVI.EOVI_WH_CODE LIKE :whCode>> <<and EOVI.EOVI_LOT_NUM in(:lotNums)>> <<and EOVI.EOVI_OWNER_CODE LIKE :customerCode>> <<and EOVI.EOVI_LOTATT04 in(:lotatt04)>>
